*Alexion recognizes that people’s professional lives are fluid and that some colleagues featured within this report may be employed  
in different positions or even at other companies by the time of publication and/or before our next CSR report is released.  
Photos throughout this report were taken prior to the COVID-19 pandemic or from a safe social distance.Dear CommunitiesAlexion is pleased to provide this overview of 
our Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) efforts 
throughout 2020, told primarily through the  
first-person perspectives of our valued employees.*
